content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals leo is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70460ad skill level easy + wool-ease® article #620 a 620-171 gold 2 balls b 620-126 chocolate brown 1 ball plus c 320-126 fun fur yarn chocolate 1 ball crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish
